#summary Using the InvokeJavascritpt method

= Introduction =

Executes an javascript function defined in the current document

== Overload List ==

public object InvokeJavascript(string)

public object InvokeJavascript(string, object[])
        
== Examples ==

Imagine we have the following javscript function defiend in the current document

{{{
function jsEval(s) {
 return eval(s); 
}
}}}

We can use the InvokeJavascritpt method to call this function like so 

{{{
geWebBrowser1.InvokeJavascript("jsExec", new object[] { "alert("+result+"+1)" });//alert 3
}}}
